thread.title: BRIEF-Pavilion Real Estate Investment Trust Says Qtrly Net Profit 82.6 Mln RGT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Pavilion Real Estate Investment Trust Says Qtrly Net Profit 82.6 Mln RGT

organizations.name: brief-pavilion real estate investment trust says qtrly

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Pavilion Real Estate Investment Trust :
* QTRLY NET PROFIT 82.6 MILLION RGT * QTRLY REVENUE 129.4 MILLION RGT * YEAR AGO QTRLY REVENUE ‍​117.5 MILLION RGT; YEAR AGO QTRLY NET PROFIT ‍​131.7 MILLION RGT
* DISTRIBUTABLE INCOME FOR H2 2017 PROPOSED TO BE 4.28 SEN PER UNIT Source text :( bit.ly/2Fda6GI ) Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
